overview: Conservative single father Adam Russo disapproves of teenage son Sam Truitt's mysterious new friend, Colton Gray. But when he learns that the sexy, blue eyed teen is homeless, David agrees to let his son's friend stay in the family guest room. Soon, an intense mutual attraction develops between the distinguished older man and the sultry young bad boy. Will caring father David confess his forbidden gay desires?
tagline: He was looking for father guidance, and found the hottest sex of his life.
title: His Son's Best Friend
